entities.name: potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as having a troubled adolescence and being interviewed by Skeeter.

entities.name: skeeter
entities.description: Skeeter is mentioned as interviewing Harry Potter and developing a close bond with him.

relationships.description: Potter and Skeeter have developed a close bond, according to Skeeter.
There are rumors that Potter was present when Dumbledore died.
